text: Figyn Blaen-Brefi is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion, west Wales. It is an upland bog. ==See also== * List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion ==External links== *geologywales.co.uk description *Davies, E. G. “Figyn Blaen Brefi: A Welsh Upland Bog.” Journal of Ecology, vol. 32, no. 2, 1945, pp. 147–166. JSTOR, JSTOR, https://www.jstor.org/stable/2256705. Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion
title: Figyn Blaen-Brefi
